mapper.update: update b_lodop set lodopid=lodopid ,lodopname=#{lodopname} ,content=#{content} ,provinceid=#{provinceid} ,cityid=#{cityid} ,countyid=#{countyid} ,lodoptype=#{lodoptype} ,isgeneral=#{isgeneral} where lodopid=#{lodopid}

update b_lodop set lodopid=lodopid ,lodopname=#{lodopname} ,content=#{content} ,provinceid=#{provinceid} ,cityid=#{cityid} ,countyid=#{countyid} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} ,lodoptype=#{lodoptype} ,isgeneral=#{isgeneral} where 1=1 and lodopid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and lodopid =#{Where_Id} and lodopid=#{Where_lodopid} and lodopname=#{Where_lodopname} and content=#{Where_content} and provinceid=#{Where_provinceid} and cityid=#{Where_cityid} and countyid=#{Where_countyid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime} and lodoptype=#{Where_lodoptype} and isgeneral=#{Where_isgeneral}
mapper.select: select t.lodopid "lodopid", t.lodopname "lodopname", t.content "content", t.provinceid "provinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.lodoptype "lodoptype", t.isgeneral "isgeneral" from b_lodop t where lodopid=#{lodopid}

select t.lodopid "lodopid", t.lodopname "lodopname", t.content "content", t.provinceid "provinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.lodoptype "lodoptype", t.isgeneral "isgeneral" from b_lodop t where 1=1 and t.lodopid=#{lodopid} and t.lodopname=#{lodopname} and t.content=#{content} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.lodoptype=#{lodoptype} and t.isgeneral=#{isgeneral}

select t.lodopid "lodopid", t.lodopname "lodopname", t.content "content", t.provinceid "provinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.lodoptype "lodoptype", t.isgeneral "isgeneral" from b_lodop t where 1=1 and t.lodopid=#{lodopid} and t.lodopname=#{lodopname} and t.content=#{content} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.lodoptype=#{lodoptype} and t.isgeneral=#{isgeneral}
mapper.delete: delete from b_lodop where 1=1 and lodopid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and lodopid =#{Where_Id} and lodopid=#{Where_lodopid} and lodopname=#{Where_lodopname} and content=#{Where_content} and provinceid=#{Where_provinceid} and cityid=#{Where_cityid} and countyid=#{Where_countyid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime} and lodoptype=#{Where_lodoptype} and isgeneral=#{Where_isgeneral}
mapper.select: select t.lodopid "lodopid", t.lodopname "lodopname", t.content "content", t.provinceid "provinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.companyid "companyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.lodoptype "lodoptype", t.isgeneral "isgeneral", lc.companyname "companyname", lg.graindepotname "graindepotname", lgp.groupname "groupname" from b_lodop t left join l_company lc on lc.companyid=t.companyid left join l_graindepot lg on lg.graindepotid=t.graindepotid left join l_group lgp on lgp.groupid=t.groupid where 1=1 and t.lodopid=#{lodopid} and t.lodopname=#{lodopname} and t.content=#{content} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.lodoptype=#{lodoptype} and t.isgeneral=#{isgeneral} and lg.graindepotname like #{graindepotname}

select count(*) from b_lodop t left join l_company lc on lc.companyid=t.companyid left join l_graindepot lg on lg.graindepotid=t.graindepotid left join l_group lgp on lgp.groupid=t.groupid where 1=1 and t.lodopid=#{lodopid} and t.lodopid!=#{NoId} and t.lodopname=#{lodopname} and t.content=#{content} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.lodoptype=#{lodoptype} and t.isgeneral=#{isgeneral} and lg.graindepotname like #{graindepotname}
